articles.title: From Monza magic to press conference laughs – Our writers pick their favourite Vettel moments - Formula 1
articles.description: As he leaves Formula 1 the German driver also leaves his fans with countless emotional and often hilarious memories. We asked our team of writers to name their favourite Vettel moments from his long and storied F1 career...
articles.content: Over his 16 seasons in the sport Sebastian Vettel notched up an astonishing 53 wins, 122 podiums, 57 pole positions and four world championships. But in leaving Formula 1 the German driver also leave… [+6075 chars]
